entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RyuJIT: implement AVX-512 support #77034
    8.0.0
  • Loop canonicalization should always create loop pre-headers #77033
    8.0.0
  • Improve JIT loop optimizations (.NET 8) #77032
    8.0.0
  • Gradual regression of System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests<Char>.IterateGetPositionArray from net6.0 to net7.0-rc2 #77028
    8.0.0
  • Blazor client debugger incorrectly reading object values as null #77031
  • [Linux] System.DirectoryServices.Protocols is not supported on this platform #77022
  • System.Text.Json worked planned for .NET 8 #77020
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Source generator improvements for .NET 8.0 #77019
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json converter infrastructure improvements for .NET 8 #77018
    8.0.0
  • Json serializer code generator doesn't support internal constructors #77016
    8.0.0
  • IWA authentication on Android fails with TypeInitializationException in NetSecurityNative #77015
  • EventSource::SendManifest causes lost events which result in unmergable ETL files #77014
    8.0.0
  • TarWriter_WriteEntry_LongFile_Tests require 104GB free #77012
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Web Assembly (.NET 7 RC2) - Debugger crashes on VS 2022 after OIDC redirect, again #77013
  • Improving Arm64 Performance in .NET 8.0 #77010
    8.0.0
  • Only canonical types show up in profilers for generics #77007
    8.0.0
  • Got error when building mono browser os. #77006
    8.0.0
  • Microsoft.Private.Intellisense package is not source-build friendly #77004
  • SocketsHttpHandler is inconsistent with header value trimming on HTTP/1.1 #77001
    Future
  • Exception thrown when making a Nullable<> generic type from a System.Enum constrained generic type parameter #77000
  • File.Copy leads to deadlocks on Ubuntu Linux #76999
  • [API Proposal]: Add http request/response correlation id to LoggingHttpMessageHandler (Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Logging) #76998
  • superpmicollect access violation in pgo Bytemark #76991
    8.0.0
  • code=killed, signal=ABRT #76987
  • Valgrind support on .NET 7 #76986
  • [API Proposal]: Add PipeOptions.FirstPipeInstance enum value #76984
  • Native AOT broken in Android-arm64 #76983
    Future
  • restore in instructions #76979
    Future
  • Equivalent to WebRequestHandler in .NET 6 #76977

Closed

  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Buffers.Tests.ReadOnlySequenceTests<Char> #72025
    8.0.0
  • ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance depends on the order of constructors' definitions #46132
    8.0.0
  • Consider including AssemblyDefinition/AssemblyReference.GetAssemblyName in netstandard1.1 build #23300
    Future
  • Add cheap/fast path for MethodBase.Invoke for use in expression interpreter #6686
    Future
  • StackOverflowException on web project code analysis #76953
  • Runtime_76346 fails in jitstress on arm64 #76910
    8.0.0
  • Remove runtime dependencies on libstdc++ #76655
    8.0.0
  • [Mono][Arm64]Improve the generated code for Vector128.Equals* on Arm64 #69325
    8.0.0
  • [release/3.1] CI failures: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpProtocolTests #76654
    8.0.0
  • HttpClient strange issue on .net 5.0 and .net 6.0 #76197
  • Repeated commits for mark array #75207
    8.0.0
  • Improving ARM64 Performance in .NET 7.0 #64820
    8.0.0
  • Cookies lose implicit port after having port property set to empty string. #70227
    8.0.0
  • Arm64: Better addressing mode for array access whose elements are accessed byref #67981
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'putArgRegNode->gtOper == GT_PUTARG_REG' #76879
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json have bug on .net461 #76995
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrWhitespace #76529
  • Mono cygwin eglib build failed direct.h not found #76993
  • Semaphore.WaitOne() does not wait on Android #76989
    7.0.x
  • CoreCLR 7.0 have changed public Debug API. Why? #76960
    7.0.x
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_76346/Runtime_76346/Runtime_76346.sh #76978

PullRequests

Created

  • Trim trailing SP and HTAB for header value on HTTP/1.1 #77030
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Add cecil as a dependency of the runtime #77029
    area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF] Fix Linux arm64 AOT ROOTFS_DIR missing (Less Impactful) #77027
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Fix Wasm.Build.Tests with stable 7.0.0 #77026
    test-failure, NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Align env var lookup in clrconfig and jithost #77025
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Swallow MSDTC availability exceptions for CI test reliability #77023
    area-System.Transactions
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #77021
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix GCShadow for regions #77011
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: minor cleanup of some inlining methods #77009
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Avoid runtime "atomic write" check in ConcurrentDictionary for shared generics #77005
    area-System.Collections
  • #76596 update icu version for norwegian culture #77003
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Use DOTNET_ variables in tests #76997
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Implement missing NAOT support (and fix garbage values passed to JIT in expandRawHandleIntrinsic) #76996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][ppc64le] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #76990
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • [WIP] statically linking GC PAL #76985
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Using 3 instruction sequence for x64 multiply #76981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Disable the hugeexpr1 test failing intermittently with issue #74555 #76950
  • retire EOL Fedora 34 #76902
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [wasm] event pipe tweaks #76994
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Port stackoverflow fix from Roslyn to SourceGenerator PolyFill #76954
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Port stackoverflow fix from Roslyn to SourceGenerator PolyFill #76946
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix insertion of alignment after BBJ_CALLFINALLY/BBJ_ALWAYS #76988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Improve the performance of Equals* for Vector128 and Vector on Arm64, when LLVM is enabled #76944
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [release/7.0] [mono][s390x] Fix wrong implementation of OP_CHECK_THIS #76920
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0][PERF][MAUI] Update Maui build Mac vmimage to macos-12 #76973
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Reintroduce typo in ICorDebug public API names #76967
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update Maui build mac version #76945
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Include hostcommon sources in hostfxr static library #75858
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Reintroduce ICorDebug typo in Mono partition as well #77002
    area-Build-mono
  • Mark the port as implicit for empty values in Cookie #76143
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [tvOS] Disable crashing test #76952
    area-System.Numerics
  • Revert "Revert "Reduce CoreCLR PAL"" #76972
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix profiler tail call insertion logic for FIELD_LIST #76883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unused code from RegexGenerator #76951
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • Remove libstdc++ dependency from NativeAOT #76705
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reintroduce typo in ICorDebug public API names #76966
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Disable JIT/opt/OSR/pinnedlocal on all Mono flavors #76980
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Cleaner way of specifying environment variables for tests #76458
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add support for using sccache on Unix #76889
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add Vector128.IsHardwareAccelerated guard for ToBase64CharsLargeNoLineBreaks #76970
    area-System.Runtime

Updated

  • Update Value of TwoDigitYearMax to 2049 #76848
    area-System.Globalization, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Introduce WASM JITs for interpreter opcodes and interp_entry wrappers #76477
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Fixes issue when monitoring a process launched via the same command line #76965
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Standardize test script naming to CLRTestBa{tc,s}h{Pre,Post}Commands #76483
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2020266 #76907
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Migrate host.tests from Newtonsoft to STJ #76901
    area-Infrastructure-installer, community-contribution
  • Don't copy coreclr version of coreclr and SPCL to core_root when targeting mono #76890
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via crossgen2 #75230
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Don't generate a nearly empty file #76835
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • API Debt - Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting #76692
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Use hashcodes when looking up the JsonSerializerOptions global cache. #76782
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][workload] Add workloads for win-arm64 using emulation #68994
    area-Build-mono
  • Add `InstructionEncoder.Switch`. #76526
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Leverage the shipping, roslyn based ApiCompat in dotnet/runtime #73263
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add missing tests for NamedPipes #72956
    area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • Add overloads to ReadFromJsonAsync #75989
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add --versiononly argument to R2RDump utility #76947
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Arm64: Add If conversion pass #73472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Cache allregs to avoid checking the type repeatedly #76850
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use BitOperations in more places #76933
    area-Meta
  • Use more spans in `System.Reflection.Metadata` et. al. #76574
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Add option for truncated stream detection #75671
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Enable visual styles for host error dialog via activation context #76762
    area-Host
  • [wasm][debugger] Remove `JToken` properties that are for internal use only #75958
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • Try changing alignment #76451
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
